committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill for the relief of Richard Saunders.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey to a named individual certain public lands upon payment of fair market value.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Richard Saunders.
